name: Yanma
flavorText:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

previous.name: Sunflora
previous.flavorText:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

next.name: Wooper
next.flavorText:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

pokemon.name: Yanmega
pokemon.flavorText:
By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.
